dcterms:creator: Owais Raza
dcterms:description: This dataset is a valuable resource for researchers in the field of Sindhi Natural Language Processing (NLP), as it represents one of the limited publicly accessible collections of Sindhi articles. It comprises a total of 3364 articles that span three distinct categories: sports, entertainment, and technology.
dcterms:title: Sindhi Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mohit Bhardwaj
Md Shad Akhtar
Asif Ekbal
Amitava Das
Tanmoy Chakraborty
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 8200 hostile and non-hostile texts from social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp. The hostile class is further subdivided into Fake, Offensive, Hate, and Defamation.
dcterms:title: Hostility Detection Dataset in Hindi

dcterms:creator: Abhishek Velankar
Hrushikesh Patil
Amol Gore
Shubham Salunke
Raviraj Joshi
dcterms:description: Dataset consists of over 25000 distinct tweets labeled into four major classes i.e hate, offensive, profane, and not-hate.
dcterms:title: L3Cube-MahaHate - Marathi

dcterms:creator: Gaurav Arora
dcterms:description: This data set contains 6500 news article headlines which are collected from Gujarati news websites. It contains 3 labels namely entertainment, business, and technology.
dcterms:title: Gujarati News Dataset

dcterms:creator: Rama Rohit Reddy Gangula
Radhika Mamidi
dcterms:description: It contains 339 different Telugu song lyrics written in Telugu script. Out of them, 230 are positive and 109 are negative. It contains a total of 13997 sentences and 81798 words.
dcterms:title: Multi-domain Corpus for Sentimental Analysis - Telugu 2 Class

dcterms:creator: Sudalai Rajkumar
dcterms:description: The data is extracted from Telugu book. It contains the following labels: business, editorial, entertainment, nation, and sport.
dcterms:title: Telugu NLP - Telugu 5 Class
